x = int(input())
kl = []
for bb in range(0, x):
    gg = int(input())
    ppr = str(input())
    i = int(input())
    ppr = ppr.strip()
    gvc = ppr.split(' ')
    vvxz = []
    for nn in gvc:
        vvxz.append(int(nn))
    amr = vvxz[i - 1]
    vvxz.sort()
    kl.append(vvxz.index(amr) + 1)
for hh in kl:
    print(hh)
